name: Shivani Polyurethane
overview:
Established in the year 1988, we, “Shivani Polyurethane and Chemicals Private Limited” is into Manufacturing and Supplying of Pigments, Lacquers and Release Agents for Polyurethane, TPR, PVC and Rubber.

Our Product Range: PU Pigments PU Pigment Industrial Lacquers Mold Release Agents Mould Cleaners Matting Agents

Infrastructure: Our manufacturing facility consists of a technologically advanced hi-tech infrastructure, sprawling over a wide area of land and facilitated with the latest machinery and technologies.

Our Quality Assurance: Our team of quality control engineers is very particular in maintaining systematized quality policies such that our range of products meets the required international standards in terms of compatibility and functionality.

Client Satisfaction: We understand that meeting our client’s need and requirement should be our main priority to become a successful player in this industry. Thus, we follow a client-centric approach, wherein we understand the unique needs and wants of our clients before assisting them to meet their diverse application requirements.

Why Us?: We are present in the chemical industry for more than two decades and are considered among the most preferred Supplier and Manufacturer in a range of chemical products like Pigments, Lacquers, and Release Agents and so on.
